mapper.select: select planeid,planename,userid,AsText(flongda) as flongda,status,updatetime from plane

select distinct planeid,planename,userid,AsText(flongda) as flongda,status,updatetime from plane where
userid = #{0} or
DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{1}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{2}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update plane set flongda =GeomFromText(#{flongda,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), height = #{height}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, where planeid =#{planeId}
